long_description: Nontoxic Lightning Nugget fire starters are made from natural wood by-products and contain no chemical additives. Nuggets are guaranteed to light easily and burn for 15 min. Unlimited shelf life makes them ideal to keep on hand for campfires, barbeques, fireplaces or emergency use. Can be used in any wood-burning appliance. Box contains 12 Lightning Nugget fire starter nuggets.
short_description: Nontoxic Lightning Nugget fire starters are made from natural wood by-products and contain no chemical additives.
